project_title: G'AIM'E: Plug & Play TIME CRISIS Gun for Modern TVs (GAIME)
key_features: High-resolution camera and AI tracking technology
Plug and play compatibility with modern TVs (15" to 150")
Officially licensed TIME CRISIS, POINT BLANK, STEEL GUNNER series
Recoil feedback and pedal controller for authentic arcade experience
No complex setup - automatic calibration and adjustment
